description: Try our easy to follow Brined Beer Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Brined Beer Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour reserved marinade into a small pan and place over medium heat. Bring mixture to boil. Combine butter and flour in a bowl. Whisk into marinade, a little at a time. Cook for 2 minutes until thick and glossy. Serve chicken with the sauce, tomatoes and basil.
